task.description: Select land points in a rectangular subregion

parameter.name: box
parameter.description: longitude-latitude box given by comma-separated list of western longitude, eastern longitude, southern latitude, and northern latitude

parameter.name: min-land-fraction
parameter.description: minimum fractional land coverage of a grid point to be considered as land point

parameter.name: ofile-name-pattern
parameter.description: pattern used for generating output file names
